item.title: Caroline add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Caroline add a quote by William Faulkner
Caroline add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description:
"Alice laughed. 'There's no use trying,' she said. 'One can't believe impossible things.'
I daresay you haven't had much practice,' said the Queen. 'When I was your age, I always did it for half-an-hour a day. Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast. There goes the shawl again!" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Caroline add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "I feel like a wet seed wild in the hot blind earth." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I would rather sit on a pumpkin, and have it all to myself, than be crowded on a velvet cushion." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description:
"As if you were on fire from within.
The moon lives in the lining of your skin." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "The way to despair is to refuse to have any kind of experience." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Robert Browning
item.description: "Who hears music, feels his solitude Peopled at once." -- Robert Browning

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Emma Goldman
item.description: "If I can't dance to it, it's not my revolution." -- Emma Goldman
